body_html:
One quibble with the above (@fmassa).

We do support variables having zero in their dimension, but only size (0,) (everything else gets reduced to that shape).

>>> torch._C._VariableFunctions.zeros( (0,4) )
Variable containing:
[torch.FloatTensor of size (0,)]

One quibble with the above (@fmassa).
We do support variables having zero in their dimension, but only size (0,) (everything else gets reduced to that shape).
>>> torch._C._VariableFunctions.zeros( (0,4) )

body:
One quibble with the above (@fmassa).

We do support variables having zero in their dimension, but only size (0,) (everything else gets reduced to that shape).
```
>>> torch._C._VariableFunctions.zeros( (0,4) )
Variable containing:
[torch.FloatTensor of size (0,)]
```
